name: FishUp
description:
Submission for DiveJam 2nd edition!

You have one breath to catch the Mighty Angry Fish and become the greatest fisherman in the pixel world. Collect jewels to upgrade your stats and improve your chances.

Game instructions:

-Move with WASD or arrow keys.

- Collect as many jewels as you can.

- Collect air pockets to replenish your available air.

- Don't let obstacles push you out of the screen.

- Monsters will reduce your available air. Avoid them!
